General.Name: Samsara Luggage Inc
General.Description: Samsara Luggage, Inc. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells smart luggage products for travelers worldwide. The company primarily offers aluminum suitcases. It sells its products directly to customers through its Website, sarah-sam.com. Samsara Luggage, Inc. was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.
General.Address: 135 East 57th Street, New York, NY, United States, 10022
